mapper.insert: INSERT INTO DELIVERY (ADDRESS1, ADDRESS2, USERNAME, SERVICEDATE, FILENAME, PRICE, WIDTH, LENGTH, HEIGHT, WEIGHT, LOADAGE) VALUES (#{address1}, #{address2}, #{username}, #{serviceDate}, #{filename}, #{price}, #{width}, #{depth}, #{weight}, #{loadage}, #{deliveryId})
mapper.update: UPDATE DELIVERY SET ADDRESS1 = #{address1}, ADDRESS2 = #{address2}, USERNAME = #{username}, SERVICEDATE = #{serviceDate}, FILENAME = #{filename}, PRICE = #{price}, WIDTH = #{width}, LENGTH = #{depth}, HEIGHT = #{height}, WEIGHT = #{weight}, LOADAGE = #{loadage} WHERE DELIVERYID= #{deliveryId}
